meta.content: Men's Fashions of The Times Magazine
meta.name: dsk

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Fashion, Beauty and Fitness

abstract.p: Anne LeBlanc interviews members of Acierno family of Astoria, Queens; photos (L) (special section, Men's Fashions of The Times) (part 2 of 2-part section)

block.p: From left: On John Simicich, 17, a nephew of Dominic Acierno, merino wool and nylon mock-neck sweater, $295, Joseph Abboud. At Saks Fifth Avenue, selected stores. Cotton pants, $60, Tommy Hilfiger. For information, call (800) 888-8802. On Rudolph Grzinic, 73, a neighbor, merino wool turtleneck, $195, Boss Hugo Boss. For information, call (800) 484-6267. On John Michael Costillo, 5 1/2, a grandnephew of Dominic, his own school uniform. On Nick Acierno, 37, a son of Dominic, flannel overshirt, $78, Eddie Bauer. At Eddie Bauer, 578 Broadway or call (800) 552-8943. On Anthony Acierno, 32, a son of Dominic, sweater, $ 78, Eddie Bauer. Pants, $120, Kenneth Cole. At Kenneth Cole, 95 Fifth Avenue or www.kennethcole.com. Shoes, Kenneth Cole. On Ivano Franzoni, 30, a nephew of Dominic, merino wool turtleneck, $195, Boss Hugo Boss. On Dominic's brother, Pasquale Acierno, 67, sweater vest, $68, and cotton dress shirt, $48, Eddie Bauer. On Dominic Acierno, 64, dress shirt, $75, Kenneth Cole. On Sozzi Ugo, 77, a neighbor, wool and cashmere sweater, $245, Polo by Ralph Lauren. At Polo Ralph Lauren, selected stores nationwide. Location: Ditmars Park, Astoria, Queens.; Above, from left: Felted wool sweater, $158, and waxed matte nylon pants, $168, cK by Calvin Klein. At Macy's. Shoes, Johnston & Murphy. Wool mohair sweater, $130, and wool-and-cashmere trousers, $255, Matt Nye. At Bergdorf Goodman Men. On Teresa Tarondo, 64, Dominic's sister-in-law and John Michael's grandmother, wool shawl, Banana Republic. Benetton sweater, Gymboree pants and Sperry shoes, all John Michael's own.; Opposite, from left: Leather jacket, $325, and pants, $89, Reaction Kenneth Cole. Cotton crew-neck top, $95, Boss Hugo Boss. Shoes, Tim Little. Black leather blazer, $625, Joseph Abboud. At Saks Fifth Avenue, selected stores. Sweater, $58, and pants, $88, Eddie Bauer. Shoes, Kenneth Cole. Cotton dress shirt, $198, John Varvatos. At Barneys New York. Bergdorf Goodman Men. On Stacey Romano, 25, Anthony's girlfriend, Donna Karan dress and shoes. Locations, both photos: Dominic and Flora Acierno's home in Astoria, Queens.; Opposite, from left: Leather shirt, $1,195, Ralph Lauren Purple Label. At Polo Ralph Lauren nationwide, selected stores. Cotton tank top, $14, Calvin Klein Underwear. At Macy's. Jeans, $68, the Polo Jeans Company Ralph Lauren. At Polo Jeans Company stores nationwide. Shoes, Kenneth Cole. Leather jacket, $495, cotton-and-Lycra shirt, $70, and polyester and wool-blend pants, $125, Tommy Hilfiger. Belt and shoes, Kenneth Cole. Leather jacket, $495, and stretch wool pants, $148. At Banana Republic, selected stores. Wool sweater, $175, Boss Hugo Boss. On Flora Acierno (in window), the wife of Dominic, sweater, Boss Hugo Boss. Location: Outside the Aciernos' apartment building.; Above, from left: On Steve Simicich, 22, a nephew of Dominic, wool sweater, $475, John Varvatos. At Barneys New York. Bergdorf Goodman Men. Cotton tank top, $14, Calvin Klein Underwear. At Macy's. Shoes, Johnston & Murphy. Poplin dress shirt, $50. At Banana Republic, selected stores. Shoes, Tim Little. Wool crew-neck sweater, $175, Boss Hugo Boss. Leather zip-front jacket, $725, Joseph Abboud. At Saks Fifth Avenue, selected stores. Merino wool crew-neck, $60. At Banana Republic, selected stores. Jeans, the Polo Jeans Company Ralph Lauren. Leather jacket, $195, Kenneth Cole. Lamb's-wool and cotton sweater, $155, Joseph Abboud. At Saks Fifth Avenue, selected stores. Location: Basement of the Aciernos' apartment building. Hair and makeup by Joshua Barrett for Garren New York. Fashion assistant: Mohammed Fofana.
